WELCOME TO BRM PILE BALIKPAPAN

Building Strong Foundations for the Future

Since 2005, BRM Pile has been delivering high-quality precast concrete products for major infrastructure and commercial projects across Indonesia.

Discover More

ABOUT US

Specializing in High Quality Prestressed Precast Concrete

PT. Balikpapan Ready Mix Pile (BRM Pile) was established in 2005 as part of PT Balikpapan Ready Mix (BRM), with a vision to lead in the manufacturing of high-quality precast concrete products. As a pioneer in Kalimantan, BRM Pile has played a key role in numerous major developments, including residential complexes, commercial buildings, ports, stadiums, and high-rise projects.

Located in the Kariangau Industrial Area, Balikpapan, BRM Pile occupies a 17-hectare site strategically positioned on the east coast of Kalimantan. This location provides both land and sea access, allowing efficient distribution and timely delivery to clients across the region.

Supported by advanced production facilities and modern machinery, BRM Pile ensures consistent quality, high standards, and competitive pricing for every project it undertakes.

Through its professionalism, strict quality control, and customer-oriented approach, BRM Pile has built strong trust among clients and gained recognition as one of the leading precast concrete manufacturers in the region.

Vision

To be the leader in the precast concrete industry in Indonesia following International standards, providing high-quality products through continual development with the ability to harness the potential of regional and global markets.

Mission

To produce high quality products with innovation and grow into a Learning Organization in order to give the highest satisfaction to customers.

ISO 9001 : 2015

Quality Management System

ISO 45001 : 2018

Occupational Health & Safety Management System

Why Choose BRM Pile?

We combine decades of experience, advanced technology, and strategic logistics to deliver quality and reliability you can count on.

Our production process follows international quality and safety standards, backed by ISO certifications.

We've earned long-term trust from leading developers and contractors across Indonesia.

OUR PRODUCTS

Precision-Crafted Precast Products You Can Rely On

We provide a wide range of precast concrete products designed for strength, precision, and flexibility:

Spun Pile

High-strength foundation piles for heavy-duty infrastructure.

Square Pile & Mini Pile

Reliable solutions for residential and commercial projects.

Sheet Pile (CCSP & FSP)

Durable precast structures for coastal and riverbank protection.

Girder

Precision-engineered beams for bridges and elevated structures.

Drainage System

Box Culvert, U-Ditch, and RCP for sustainable water management.

Custom Precast

Flexible configurations to meet specific project requirements.
